name: Chenglin Miao
content: Chenglin Miao's Homepage Chenglin Miao Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science Iowa State University Ames, IA 50011 Office: 228 Atanasoff Hall Email: cmiao at iastate dot edu Openings | Biography | Publications | Teaching | Professional Activities Openings: I am looking for prospective Ph.D students and visiting scholars. If you are interested in working with me, feel free to send me your CV. Graduate admission information can be found here. Biography I am currently an assistant professor in the Department of Computer Science at Iowa State University. Prior to joining Iowa State, I was an assistant professor of Computer Science at the University of Georgia from 2020 to 2022. I obtained my Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from the State University of New York at Buffalo, where I was supervised by Prof. Lu Su. My research interests include the Internet of Things, cyber-physical systems, security and privacy, and machine learning. My current work primarily focuses on designing and deploying trustworthy AI techniques for mobile, embedded, and networked systems.
